programme.desc: The Wishing Well - Granny Pig is really pleased with all the plastic gnomes and the wishing well she's got for the garden, but Grandpa Pig wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Perfume - After smelling Granny Pig's perfume de lavender, Peppa experiments with the flowers in the garden to create her own special smell.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The Children's Fete - The school roof is leaky again, so the children organize a fair to raise money for a new roof.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned. The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. The Barbapapas decide to go to the park.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Paddington's Hero Squad / Paddinton's Knightly Quest - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy gain super powers from a superfood cake. Paddington is on a mission to become a Knight.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep708
programme.desc: Mission to Mars - NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep425
programme.desc: Pups Save Baby Humdinger / Pups Save a Pinata - Tracker has a dream that Mayor Humginder turns into a baby! Alex is hosting a fun party in Adventure Bay but is heartbroken when his special pinata mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep501
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew / Pups Save an Ostrich - Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better then the PAW Patrol. The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep301
programme.desc: The Danceathon / What Goes Up - Lannie visits Carnivore Cove and joins Baby and his friends for a dance marathon. Baby is thrilled to have a new bubbaloon pal until he faces the possibility of losing it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Child Of The Stars I / Child Of The Stars II - Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery / Paddington And The Fossil Hunt - What's making the strange noises in the cave? Jonathan thinks it's a mermaid, but Paddington isn't so sure. Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport. After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Rainbow's Lost Colors / Boots' Rubber Band Ball - The twins are excited to see their first rainbow, but it's missing its colors! Boots' rubber band ball bounces into the Forest Next Door, and he must ask Cynthia the Centipede to get it back.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Meatball Mayhem - Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball and it grows to an enormous size. It's up to Blaze and Pickle to stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Chips & Dip / Bee's Knees Tea - Chef and Olly make French onion dip, but Chef can't stop crying from the onions! When the Queen Bee comes to a Stump tea party, Chef's determined to put on a party fit for a queen.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Great Shark Hunter - Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks - Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Sharkdog Home Alone - When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Splish Spashketball / The Slug Hank Redemption - Baby, Vola, and William head to Hydrospace to take on Shadow's team in the Splashketball Finals. Detective Baby Shark and William Watson team up with Hank to help the Slobber Slug out of a jam.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wavey Jones' Locker - Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1112
programme.desc: Pups Save the Yumi Bee - Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival. When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep520
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Train to the Rescue - Miss Rabbit's train has broken down, so Grandpa Pig lends her his toy train, Trudy.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep521
programme.desc: The Pet Competition - Playgroup is having a pet competition and everyone has brought their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but it is so hard to choose the best pet...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep522
programme.desc: Spider's Web - Ew! There's a spider in the house! Mummy Pig tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep158
programme.desc: Go Find it - Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back. But the objects are not easy to gather!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep159
programme.desc: Ron Stays Over - When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything they can to get him to stop him.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Freeze Pops - Tiny Chef makes ice pops but can't wait for them to freeze! He learns that patience is an important part of cooking.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1806SensationalSubmissions
programme.desc: There are some submissions even more impressive and surprising than a knockout. On this episode of UFC Unleashed we showcase 4 stunning submissions featuring Jessica Andrade, Dricus Du Plessis, Dustin Poirier and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: At UFC 304 in Manchester, England, UFC Welterweight champion Leon "Rocky" Edwards defends his title against Belal "Remember the Name" Muhammad in a highly anticipated rematch.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep1101
programme.desc: Gaethje vs Holloway - UFC 300 was not only a milestone event for the worlds leading MMA organization but featured a highly anticipated bout between Justin Gaethje and Max Holloway as they battled for the BMF belt and the title of the baddest fighter on the planet. See their fight like never seen before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts

programme.title: Premium Spectacular S1
programme.desc: Premium Spectacular offers Phoenixs finest documentaries in our weekend prime time slot. Each episode comes relevant to the latest news that hits the headlines. Themes range from hot current affair issues at home and abroad, to diverse topics of social, historical and cultural interests.

programme.title: Phoenix Midday Express S1
programme.desc: Presenting the most update international and financial news breaking before lunch, viewers can turn it to stay informed about events happening around the world.

programme.title: Phoenix Weather Forecast S1
programme.desc: Phoenixs engaging young presenter tracks weather movements and forecasts upcoming conditions in her upbeat, lively presentation coupled with music, folklore and traditional wisdom pertaining to different weather conditions in various times of the year, making Weather Forecast a true delight regardless of rain or shine.

programme.title: Phoenix News Express S1
programme.desc: Phoenix News Express" focuses on local news in Hong Kong, while also paying attention to information developments in various fields at home and abroad.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hot Kitchen S1
programme.desc: Senior commentator Cheng Jiannan invited famous political and economic figures to gather at "Hong Kong Hot Kitchen" to use current affairs as ingredients, to illustrate other things, to see the big picture from the small details, to use creativity as cooking skills, to turn depth into the right degree of heat, to butcher the cow like a butcher, and to analyze and decode.

programme.title: We Are One S1
programme.desc: We Are One uses a documentary shooting method, from the perspective of people, animals, and nature living in harmony, tells a touching story of cross-species, highlighting the noble sentiments of purity and kindness. As the sons of the earth, we are in harmony with nature, and all things coexist with love.

programme.title: Under the power S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Lu Yi is a cold, ruthless and authoritative high-ranking officer of the Ming Dynasty's Jinyiwei (also known as the Brocaded Guards for their elaborately embroidered uniforms). The Jinyiwei are part of the Emperor's elite bodyguards that also serve as the secret police, and Lu Yi is one of the best at his job.

programme.title: Sherlock S1 Ep14
programme.desc: It is the first all-female immersive reasoning program. Six guests form a female reasoning team and immerse themselves in workplace life.
